Params: {1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'Hey, this is for you, lady from Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She rummages under her seat for a while before pulling out a rifle—a makeshift weapon cobbled together from various parts, looking barely functional.'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'Judging by your moves earlier, you should know how to handle this. We might face more attacks on the way, so you can borrow it for now.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The woman in dancer's attire gives a graceful nod, takes the rifle, and checks the chamber by pulling back the ejection port."}
{3: "To the soldiers, this is quite an unusual sight. Curiosity spreads among them, hidden beneath the transport vehicle's heavy armor."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: "Hiding in our transport to get here... You're trying to find a way into Aerospace City too, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'Why do you want to go to the city? Do you have family or friends there?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "...Stay alert. This isn't the time for chitchat.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The excited girl pays no mind to the veteran's warning as she pulls out a palm-sized object from her tactical vest's pocket."}
{3: 'She hesitates, then repeatedly presses her thumb against the crumpled foil wrapper, as if the gesture alone could somehow smooth out all its wrinkles.'}
{3: 'After making sure it looks presentable enough, the young soldier hands the item to Hanying.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'You were a huge help during that battle just now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'Th-this... I got it in exchange for working night shifts at the landfill outside the city for a week.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: "Although it looks a bit shabby, I swear I haven't opened it! It's brand-new dark chocolate!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The veteran shakes his head slightly, a resigned expression on his face, but he doesn't seem genuinely agitated.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: "You don't have to...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: "It's fine, really! Sure, it's valuable, but it's not that rare. I've got more, so take it!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: "You must have lost a lot of energy too... Don't be shy, just take it, okay?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Well... thanks.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying accepts the gift, lowering her head to read the packaging description. Cocoa and sugar—while useless as energy sources for a mechanoid, stand as proof of human kindness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: 'You mentioned exchange earlier... What do you mean? Do people in Aerospace City still need to barter for supplies?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Upon hearing Hanying's words, the veteran beside her steadies himself, using his rifle as support to stand up straight."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "...You don't know?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Seeing the confusion on Hanying's face, the veteran sighs heavily."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "I thought you were working with those mechanoids, but now I see... you really don't know what's going on at all.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The young soldier's friendly demeanor seems to affect the veteran, making him relax his guard a bit."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Judging by your attire... you must be sent by Kowloong.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '...Yes, I am affiliated with Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She doesn\'t quite understand why these people are so hostile toward "mechanoids." Her logical calculations tell her it\'s not the right time to reveal her identity as one.'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: '...So Kowloong finally remembered to send help?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "You've got some serious fighting skills. That's clear enough. But for reinforcements... is it really just you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "...I'm less of a reinforcement and more of a scout.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Not being one for deception, she can only try to play along with the veteran's line of thought."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "A scout? What, came to check if we're all dead yet?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Though not responsible for their situation, she can still hear the weariness in the veteran's voice."}
{3: "Perhaps they've been waiting far too long for someone to apologize."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "...Tsk, forget it. I won't give you a hard time, young lady.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Hanying complies with the man's judgment, and the tense atmosphere visibly eases."}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "So, what's the situation in the city right now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Weren't you listening? Like she just said—you work, you get food. Simple as that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Here, humans aren't the ones making the rules anymore.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: "Humans aren't the ones making the rules...?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: '...It all happened a long time ago.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The young soldier fumbles for the right words while the veteran beside her lets out another weary sigh.'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'Ever since that spiky-headed mechanoid appeared out of nowhere, the city has no longer been ours.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'She hijacked the central control system and incited the mechanoids to rebel.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: "The seniors say the city organized many armed counterattacks, but there's no way humans could stand up to those metal chunks...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The young soldier lowers her head, seemingly unsure about recounting history she never experienced firsthand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: '...Back when this place was a research hub, we soldiers actually had the easiest job around.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "I mean, who'd dare cause trouble when even our location was top secret?", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'But after that incident broke out... Under Spikehead\'s leadership, the mechanoids "executed" the former research director. Then, Spikehead installed a traitor as the governor and firmly took control of the city.', 4: '2'}
{3: "This kind of environment doesn't feel unfamiliar to Hanying from the past."}

{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Then those mechanoids started tormenting everyone with their 24/7 nonstop work demands, forcing people to rack up work hours in exchange for food, clothing, and other necessities.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "They couldn't care less about the elderly or children—if you don't meet the work hours, they'll let you starve to death.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Who would've thought... that we'd end up fighting our own mechanoids...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hanying freezes at the mention of these twisted laws...'}
{3: 'Her left hand instinctively touches her neck, though the stinging electrical currents are no longer there.'}
{3: "Unlike physical scars that can be forced away, these bitter memories aren't so easily shed."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory171.png'}
{3: 'The promise shared between only her and that girl, forever trapped in the miles that could never be achieved.'}
{3: 'At last, they bid farewell to the dust of time and embarked on a new journey.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory953.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory178.png'}
{3: 'Sage, the Church, the street vendors and their bustling crowds—everything continues to move forward.'}
{3: 'Yet time is a cruel circle, leading her once again toward the same tragedy.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory821.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hanying', 3: '(A spiked-headed mechanoid... From the description, they sound like an outsider too.)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: '(Could it be Veronica?)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: "Ahem... Anyway, life in the city might be tough, but at least it's better than being outside, not knowing where your next meal will come from.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Another sigh from the veteran pulls Hanying's thoughts back to the cramped carriage."}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Does Kowloong... have some plans?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Will they send more soldiers to take back Aerospace City? It used to be such an important aerospace base...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: "I've never seen what Kowloong looks like. Is it similar to Aerospace City?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hanying', 3: 'Well, Kowloong is...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before she can answer, a sudden impact cuts through the lively atmosphere in the carriage.'}
{3: 'A deafening blast accompanies the impact, with vibrations too intense for even the thick-armed walls to absorb.'}
{3: 'The sudden crisis puts an abrupt end to their casual conversation.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier B', 3: 'Enemy attack incoming, take cover! Gunners, at the ready!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The previously laid-back veteran now displays his sharp professional instincts, coordinating the soldiers inside the vehicle as they ready themselves for combat.'}
{3: 'The young girl in combat gear sheds her innocent demeanor, skillfully climbing onto the rotating mount of the gun turret and positioning herself halfway through the roof hatch.'}
{3: "Being a mechanoid naturally immune to gunfire noise, Hanying doesn't reach for the noise-canceling equipment like the humans around her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cargo Crew Soldier A', 3: 'Ugh...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A brief, muffled thud comes from the roof first—the sound of a sharp weapon cutting through the air and striking something soft.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryJianXue.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The once lively figure suddenly goes limp, legs dangling, as warm liquid splatters from above.'}
{3: "Hanying suddenly realizes she hasn't asked for her name yet."}
